description: Checks device-specific information, such as the device type, software version, IP addresses, and lock status.

parameters.name: managedDeviceId
parameters.description: The ID of the device that you are checking the information of.

nested_items.name: associatedWithJob
nested_items.description: The ID of the job used when ordering the device.

nested_items.name: deviceCapacities
nested_items.description: The hardware specifications of the device.

nested_items.name: available
nested_items.description: The amount of capacity available for use on the device.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the type of capacity, such as memory.

nested_items.name: total
nested_items.description: The total capacity on the device.

nested_items.name: unit
nested_items.description: The unit of measure for the type of capacity.

nested_items.name: used
nested_items.description: The amount of capacity used on the device.

nested_items.name: deviceState
nested_items.description: The current state of the device.

nested_items.name: deviceType
nested_items.description: The type of Amazon Web Services Snow Family device.

nested_items.name: lastReachedOutAt
nested_items.description: When the device last contacted the Amazon Web Services Cloud. Indicates that the device is online.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: When the device last pushed an update to the Amazon Web Services Cloud. Indicates when the device cache was refreshed.

nested_items.name: managedDeviceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the device.

nested_items.name: managedDeviceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the device that you checked the information for.

nested_items.name: physicalNetworkInterfaces
nested_items.description: The network interfaces available on the device.

nested_items.name: defaultGateway
nested_items.description: The default gateway of the device.

nested_items.name: ipAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address of the device.

nested_items.name: ipAddressAssignment
nested_items.description: A value that describes whether the IP address is dynamic or persistent.

nested_items.name: macAddress
nested_items.description: The MAC address of the device.

nested_items.name: netmask
nested_items.description: The netmask used to divide the IP address into subnets.

nested_items.name: physicalConnectorType
nested_items.description: The physical connector type.

nested_items.name: physicalNetworkInterfaceId
nested_items.description: The physical network interface ID.

nested_items.name: installState
nested_items.description: The state of the software that is installed or that is being installed on the device.

nested_items.name: installedVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the software currently installed on the device.

nested_items.name: installingVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the software being installed on the device.
(string) ---
(string) ---
